title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added documentation for immutable releases (preview feature), including enabling, verifying integrity, and preventing changes.
Updated Actions release management docs to reference immutable releases and adjusted release steps.
Modified dind configuration in Actions runner controller for Kubernetes versions (>=1.29 uses sidecar container).
Improved accessibility of AI search copy button with descriptive labels.
Adjusted REST API permissions for secret scanning and extended Copilot metrics date range.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added documentation for immutable releases (preview feature), including enabling, verifying integrity, and preventing changes.
- Updated Actions release management docs to reference immutable releases and adjusted release steps.
- Modified dind configuration in Actions runner controller for Kubernetes versions (>=1.29 uses sidecar container).
- Improved accessibility of AI search copy button with descriptive labels.
- Adjusted REST API permissions for secret scanning and extended Copilot metrics date range.

### Title
Add immutable releases preview, update dind for K8s 1.29, and improve accessibility
